article_title: In the Spotlight: Johnny Roberts finds family feeling in restaurant work, marketing for Isaac's
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: MARY ELLEN WRIGHT | Staff Writer

og.description: Johnny Roberts, marketing coordinator for Isaac's, has always found that working in restaurants creates a family feeling. This month, his "cause marketing" efforts are focused on breast cancer awareness.
